document_data.name: Silent Arrow Clan
document_data.mainbody: The '''Silent Arrow Clan''' was a group of [[jungle giant]]s found deep in the rain forests of [[east Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Activities: The jungle giants made the fatal mistake of attacking the [[necromancer]]s who claimed the ruins of [[Ysawis]], believing them to be weak and puny. As a result, the entire clan was slain and reanimated to serve as an elite [[zombie]] guard for the necromancer's [[Jade Palace of the Necromancers|Jade Palace]].
document_data.Base of Operations: The Silent Arrow clan claimed territory in the [[Grey Jungle]] near the ruins of Ysawis.
